validationMessages.vehicleRegistrationDateOne: Registration date should be prior or equal to todays date.
validationMessages.vehicleRegistrationDateTwo: Registration date be in between DISP_PAST_DATE to todays date.

validationMessages.vehicleRegistrationDateFour: Registration date should be prior to previous policy expiry date.

validationMessages.changeRTOConfirmMsg: Registration City do not match with the selected RTO office and this might impact the calculated premium. Are you sure you want to change the RTO office?

validationMessages.generalisedMotorErrMsg:
We did not get quote from the Insurer. It may be because

  • Insurer is not reachable to provide real-time quotes currently.
  • Your vehicle model or location are not serviced by the insurer.
  • Insurance is not provided by the insurer for your vehicle age.
validationMessages.generalisedLifeErrMsg:
We did not get quote from the Insurer. It may be because

  • Selected products and rider combinations are not available with the Insurer.
  • The product do not provide coverage currently for the details provided.
  • The product require medical tests based on the details provided.
validationMessages.generalisedMedicalErrMsg:
We did not get quote from the Insurer. It may be because

  • Insurer is not reachable to provide real-time quotes currently.
  • You might have opted for some members who cannot be covered in a family floater policy.
  • Some members might have a pre-existing disease which these insurer do not cover or require medical tests.
validationMessages.generalisedTravelErrMsg:
We did not get quote from the Insurer. It may be because

  • Insurer is not reachable to provide real-time quotes currently.
  • Your destination or medical condition are not serviced by the insurer.
  • Insurance is not provided by the insurer for provided traveller's age.
validationMessages.generalisedFormInvalidErrMsg:
We did not get quote from the Insurer. It may be because

  • You did not provide all the required inputs. Provide all the necessary inputs highlighted on the left side to get quote.

applicationStaticContent.homePageAppInfoKey4: All insurance Policies in one mobile app
applicationStaticContent.homePageAppInfoheader1: One app for all insurance needs!
applicationStaticContent.homePageAppInfoValue5: Policies365 aims to assist you to choose from a wide range of life and general insurance products. As a policy buyer, you deserve to cherry-pick the product that best suits your needs. For this purpose, we have partnered with various insurance companies, helping you compare different plans along with key features, additional benefits, relevant price and industry specific measurements.
applicationStaticContent.homePageAppInfoValue6-a1: Great service, just what I needed to get my insurance done easily!
applicationStaticContent.homePageAppInfoValue6-a2: Virat Kohli, CEO & Founder, Sunny Sports Company
applicationStaticContent.homePageAppInfoValue6-b1: Great Service, just what I needed to get my insurance done easily!
applicationStaticContent.homePageAppInfoValue6-b2: Virat Kohli, CEO & Founder, Sunny Sports Company
applicationStaticContent.homePageAppInfoValue6-c1: Great Service, just what I needed to get my insurance done easily!
applicationStaticContent.homePageAppInfoValue6-c2: Virat Kohli, CEO & Founder, Sunny Sports Company
applicationStaticContent.homePageAppAdvantageValue1: Empowering customers to make decision through product transparency and data.
applicationStaticContent.homePageAppAdvantageValue2: Scan policies in Policies365 mobile app. All insurance needs serviced on fingertips.
applicationStaticContent.homePageAppAdvantageValue3: We have used design thinking, mobile, AI and gamification to re-imagine insurance.
applicationStaticContent.homePageAppAdvantageValue4: RoboAdvisor and algorithms helps customer get appropriate coverage at lower price.
applicationStaticContent.homePageAppAdvantageKey5: All insurance Policies in one mobile app
applicationStaticContent.homePageAppAdvantageValue5: Scan your policy and convert it to a digital insurance card in your mobile phone
applicationStaticContent.homePageAppAdvantageValue6: No need to call or login to website for a claim, paying premium, renewing policies
applicationStaticContent.homePageAppAdvantageValue7: Save on insurance based on your fitness, car driving and personal profile.
applicationStaticContent.homePageAppAdvantageValue8: Get preventive alerts and emergency guidance when you need it most.
applicationStaticContent.homePageProductInfoValue1: For most of you out there, the addition of a new member of engineering to your family is an extension of your lifestyle.  Explore our selective car insurance products and find the appropriate coverage for your vehicle.
applicationStaticContent.homePageProductInfoValue2: From commuting to work to long weekend rides and racing, the love for one's bike comes as no surprise. Therefore, it is equally important to provide the finest bike coverage while we come up with a number of personalized plans just for you.
applicationStaticContent.homePageProductInfoValue3: Life is full of uncertainties. Nevertheless, you can be assured that your loved ones will be financially secured in case of any mishap. Allow us to guide you through the maze of options available for life insurance products, and you can opt for the precise plan.
applicationStaticContent.homePageProductInfoValue4: Health insurance trends in the industry need to be kept up with the varying pace. Get help in choosing the most appropriate health coverage for you and your family members so that you can fix what ails you anytime, without breaking your piggy bank.
applicationStaticContent.homePageProductInfoValue5: Rightly said often Home is where the heart is, we understand that your home is more than just a building. Insurance companies offer comprehensive home insurance policies to cover the house structure and personal belongings, and you can choose the right one by leveraging on our personal assistance.
applicationStaticContent.homePageProductInfoValue6: All set to travel? Let us enhance your travel experience by bringing forth a far-flung choice of travel insurance products from the industry.  From the start of your journey, to the last day, relax and enjoy your vacation, if you have got covered whatever comes your way!
applicationStaticContent.modalLoaderHeader1: Hang on, we're getting the best products for you
applicationStaticContent.modalLoaderHeader2: Meanwhile, why don't you check out the Policies365 mobile app?
applicationStaticContent.homePageHeaderOne: How are we making insurance good?
applicationStaticContent.homePageHeaderOneValue1:
What is good for customers is good for us!! Our core purpose, user experience design, decision making process, business model, is all oriented towards keeping "Customer First" in mind.
This is our Purpose!!
applicationStaticContent.homePageHeaderOneValue2: A few examples of our utmost belief in power of technology include Policies365 One-for-All mobile wallet, Artificial Intelligence powered Robo Advisors and Machine Learning based quote results. This is our Strength!!
applicationStaticContent.homePageHeaderOneValue3: To share and contribute is not only an individual and corporate social responsibility, but a delight. We sponsor a meal and a smile for each policy bought through Policies365 on behalf of our customers. This is our Happiness!!
applicationStaticContent.homePageCustSayContent1: Most of the insurance web portals are full of clutter. Policies365 is different.
applicationStaticContent.homePageCustSayContent2: Earlier I would buy the cheapest product; now I can see both benefit comparison and price as numbers.
applicationStaticContent.homePageCustSayContent3: Policies365 is clearly above any other websites to buy insurance policies.
applicationStaticContent.homePageCustSayContent4: P365 provides an easier way to evaluate policy features by different categories.
applicationStaticContent.homePageCustSayContent5: Policies365 provides the most relevant information in the simplest manner to buy an insurance policy.
applicationStaticContent.homePageCustSayContent6: Robo Advisor replaces the need to speak with an agent
applicationStaticContent.homePageCustSayContent7: Social consciousness was a big reason for me to buy through policies365
applicationStaticContent.homePageCustSayContent8: Quotes are displayed in a way that makes it easy for users to find the best product for their needs
applicationStaticContent.homePageCustSayContent9: I liked Robo Advisor. It guided me to what coverages I should be looking for.
applicationStaticContent.homePageCustSayContent10: It was a good feeling to sponsor meals for children every time I bought a policy
applicationStaticContent.homePageCustSayContent11: Policies365 makes the policy comparison extremely transparent across all features and not just price.
applicationStaticContent.homePageCustSayContent12: P365 acts as a one-stop shop for all your insurance needs
applicationStaticContent.homePageCustSayContent13: This is one of the best insurance purchase experiences Ive had. Youll actually enjoy policy buying!
applicationStaticContent.homePageCustSayContent14: Policies365 allowed me to focus on my need rather than getting tangled into ads or sales assist calls
applicationStaticContent.homePageCustSayContent15: Chat Bots are FANTASTIC! Intuitive and a real pleasure to use.
applicationStaticContent.homePageCustSayContent16: People with vague insurance knowledge are connected to the right insurer. I see that as a real shift in the current buying process.
applicationStaticContent.homePageCustSayContent17: I cant say enough on how well its tailored to the needs of an insurance web portal
applicationStaticContent.homePageCustSayContent18: P365 gave me a step-by-step guidance on how to choose the right policy for me
applicationStaticContent.homePageCustSayContent19: Friendly, professional and efficient service is what attracts me the most!
applicationStaticContent.homePageCustSayContent20: I am amazed to see how Policies365 has leveraged on the latest technology to ease out the insurance buying process.

tootip.engineNoTooltip: It is the identification number marked in your vehicle engine and you can find it in Previous Car Insurance Policy/ Vehicle Registration Certificate for that. This generally is a combination of alphabets and numbers and between 6 to 12 characters length.
tootip.chassisNoTooltip: This is also referred to as Vehicle Identification Number and you can find it in Previous Car Insurance Policy/ Vehicle Registration Certificate for that. You can also find by looking at windshield on the driver side of your car. This generally would be alphabets & numbers and of 17 characters length.
tootip.regNoTooltip: This is the number written in your Vehicle number plate/ Previous Car Insurance Policy/ top of your Vehicle Registration Certificate.
